Translations: [{"Text":"keep waving; keep flapping; keep fluttering","Explanation":"For a wide and big cloth, etc., to keep swaying fast and strongly in the wind, or to make this happen."}]
[{"Text":"if it's like my mind","Explanation":"If one follows as one thinks."}]
[{"Text":"be caught in one's mind","Explanation":"To feel uncomfortable out of worry."}]
